meanings.definition: The exploration of caves, especially as a hobby.
meanings.sent1: Spelunking can be an exciting adventure for those who love exploring caves.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy spelunking during their free time to discover hidden underground wonders.
meanings.sent3: When the spelunking club organized a trip, they found themselves in a cave full of bats!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a dark cave, and spelunking through her thoughts revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of spelunking through the mysterious caverns left a lasting impression on him.

meanings.definition: To explore caves as a recreational activity.
meanings.sent1: We decided to go spelunking this weekend to explore the nearby caves.
meanings.sent2: Spelunking requires proper gear and a sense of adventure to delve into the depths of caves.
meanings.sent3: As they spelunked deeper into the cave, they stumbled upon a hidden underground lake!
meanings.sent4: Spelunking through the dark tunnels of the cave felt like navigating through a maze of secrets.
meanings.sent5: The echoes of their footsteps while spelunking reverberated through the cavern, creating an eerie atmosphere.
